backend/main.mo: Main restaurant canister implementing menu, orders, documents, notifications, access control, blob storage, and Stripe config with state maps and helper functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new state types and a run function that updates restaurant location URL while preserving existing data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and root mounting element.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app name, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing static caching, dynamic caching, network strategies, and skip-waiting message handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root configuring routes, theme provider, cart context, toaster, and install prompt.
frontend/src/components/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with restaurant info, dynamic location fallback, contact details, and operating hours.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation bar with links, cart summary, notifications, login state, and admin access.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Shows a custom PWA installation prompt triggered by the beforeinstallprompt event with install and dismiss options.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with a shared header and footer around routed page content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with status feedback and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Admin-only form for configuring Stripe secret keys and allowed countries with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/constants/menuCategories.ts: Defines shared menu categories and admin-specific categories for item management.
frontend/src/constants/whatsapp.ts: Stores WhatsApp phone and base URL constants for click‑to‑chat links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, supporting login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating menu items, orders, user roles, notifications, and restaurant settings via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard for managing orders, menu items, broadcast messages, and restaurant settings.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles cart checkout, Stripe session creation, and WhatsApp order fallback.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays restaurant contact details, location, hours, and WhatsApp quick contact options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and WhatsApp contact link.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Displays the menu with category filters, loads items from the backend, shows skeletons while loading, and allows adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays user notifications with icons and statuses, supports marking notifications as read and navigating to related orders.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows a table of the user's past orders with status labels, loading states, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTrackingPage.tsx: Displays detailed tracking information for a specific order with status-based styling, loading and error states, and navigation back to order history.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation message with options to return to checkout or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe payment, creates an order, clears the cart, and displays order confirmation or processing status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp deep links and formats an order message from cart items and totals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind setup with theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and feature requests related to updating the Contact page map coordinates.
